title: Review completed website changes — approval needed
description: Abu completed all requested changes Feb 17. Changes include: title tags, meta descriptions, image optimization (WebP), dual mobile menu removal (keep floating blue), boat page image resizing. Full QC pass required before marking done.
notes: Non-paying client — friend of Gavin. Low billing priority but should be closed cleanly.

title: Resolve mobile responsive layout issues
description: Multiple mobile display problems flagged Nov 2025. 22-comment thread. Needs full QC pass on mobile — test all breakpoints. Likely partially unresolved despite team claiming done.
basecampThread: This site seems to have a responsive issue on mobile

title: Replace TECHNET warranty with WORLDPAC warranty sitewide
description: Remove TECHNET logo. Update warranty page with WORLDPAC 24 MONTH / 24,000 MILE NATIONWIDE REPAIR LIMITED WARRANTY. Replace ALL Technet mentions sitewide. PDF content in Basecamp thread.

title: PPC — clean up conversions, optimize negative keywords, produce report
description: Remove unused Google Ads conversions. Fix negative keyword list across all campaigns. Track: appointments, calls, contact form submissions. Gavin requested a report showing all work done (Dec 12 request). Status per Abu: done Dec 12, unverified.

title: Verify AutoOps appointment form is live and tracking conversions
description: Client uses AutoOps for scheduling (API key in vault: autoops-api-key-cerrones). Confirm widget is functional. Confirm Google Ads is tracking appointment bookings as conversions.

title: Investigate and resolve GSC indexing error
description: Gavin flagged GSC error Dec 17 with screenshot. Only 2 comments — no confirmed resolution. Log into GSC, identify issue, fix and document.

title: Porsche display ads — verify live or build and launch
description: Non-Google display ads, Porsche-only. Messaging: better price than dealer, easy pickup/drop off. Sizes: 400x400 and 300x188px. Requested Oct 2025 — verify if live, if not build and launch.

title: Website PageSpeed audit and performance fixes
description: Site was failing mobile and desktop PageSpeed May 2025. 29-comment thread. Verify current scores. Fix any outstanding performance issues. Document before/after scores.

description: Two embed codes provided by Gavin Jan 4: one for slider (all pages except testimonials), one for testimonials page. Abu asked to go live. Status: pending Gavin review. Testimonials: https://sevciksservicecenter.com/testimonials/

title: Resume and maintain monthly GMB posting
description: No GMB updates since October 2025. Abu claimed Google was suspending GMBs — Gavin challenged this Jan 14. Establish consistent monthly GMB update schedule. College Station TX audience. Primary: collegestationautorepair.com.
basecampThread: SEO, GMB, PPC, GA4, GTM, Search Console

title: Fix remaining website issues from client review PDF (Dec 2025)
description: Client submitted detailed review PDF Dec 2025. Items to verify: gas station section language (not 'gas station' — 'full service fuel pump'), lube center quick link fix, testimonials 'learn more' → reviews page, contact page CTA updated. Abu said 'all changes done' Dec 9 but Gavin found issues Dec 12.

title: CRITICAL: Fix all 10 satellite sites and re-submit for approval
description: All 10 domain sites rejected by Gavin Feb 18. Required fixes across all sites: (1) Remove dead social media icons from all sites, (2) City name standard: 'In Simi Valley' not just 'Simi Valley' in all blog sentences, (3) Replace all wrong car images (non-Porsche vehicles, bicycle-making woman, etc.), (4) Fix broken/truncated layouts on mobile, (5) Replace all placeholder/dummy content, (6) Contact page — correct company name, (7) Fix wrong city names in blogs, (8) Formatting issues — numbers/address breaking to multiple lines globally.
notes: 3-month window to prove the satellite site concept started Jan 3. Our T1/T2/T3 product matrix supersedes the old 62-domain plan. This is a showcase project.

title: Verify ShopMonkey appointment scheduler is live on site
description: Client uses ShopMonkey. Scheduler script: https://app.shopmonkey.cloud/scripts/scheduler.js?lid=5c74ecda5d0bae0ab247e5df&e=stable. API key in vault (shopmonkey-api-key-german-auto-doctor). Verify it is on the Schedule Appointment page and functioning.

title: GMB dominance — all local keywords to #1
description: Gavin directive: GMB ranking is the primary focus. All local keywords must be #1. Review BrightLocal report (GAD.pdf in Basecamp) for current keyword standings, identify gaps, and build monthly GMB update + citation plan.

title: Execute GHM 3-month SEO plan (California → USA)
description: SEO plan for GHM's own website submitted. New pages and blogs needed. Migrate social media credentials from Google Sheet to vault. Track keyword rankings monthly.

title: Audit: confirm all staging/mock sites removed from live servers
description: Gavin ordered all mock/staging sites removed from servers Nov 2025 to prevent duplicate content indexing. Team claimed done but unverified. Audit hosting and confirm no staging domains are live or indexed.

title: Credential audit — verify vault is current source of truth for all client WP logins
description: Gavin has been locked out of client sites multiple times due to unauthorized password changes. Verify all WP credentials in vault are current. Establish protocol: vault is single source of truth, changes logged immediately.
notes: AOS and McIlvain creds just added to vault from Basecamp discovery. McIlvain Mar 2025 creds may be stale — verify against current WP admin before using.
